#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int calc(string A,int K)
{
    int ret = 0, to = -1 ,i;
    for(i=0;i<A.length();++i)
    {
        if(i<=to && A[i]==A[i-1])
            continue;
        ++ret;
        to = i + K - 1;
    }
    return ret;
}




int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin.tie(0);
    int T;
    cin>>T;
    for(;T;--T)
    {
        int N , i , j , K ;
        cin>>N>>K;

        string S;
        int ctr = 1;
        cin>>S;
        for(i=1;i<S.length();++i)
        {
            S[i]==S[i-1]?++ctr:ctr=1;
            if(ctr==K)
                break;
        }
        if(i==S.length())
        {
            cout<<-1<<'\n';
            continue;
        }

        string A = S.substr(0,i+1);
        string B = S.substr(i-K+1,S.length() - (i-K+1)  );
        reverse(B.begin(),B.end());
        cout<<calc(A,K)+calc(B,K)-1<<"\n";

    }
    return 0;
}
